title: Oresama Toushou no Wakaokusama
description: Chika is at a hotel for a job interview, but one thing leads to another, and she ends up in a passionate kiss with Iori Sakura, the master swordsmith everyone in the industry raves about. Not having any experience with men prior to this, Chika thinks they need to at least go on a date before locking lips. But, before she knows it, he's grazing, kissing and licking her body so sweetly... A hot and steamy newlywed romance.
